perturbation.original_text:
Subject to Emdeon’s compliance with the provisions of this Agreement, Emdeon is hereby authorized and licensed to use the Content
by making such Content available to third parties verbatim or as source material via the Software. Such license is a non-exclusive, non-transferrable
and worldwide license and shall include the right to use, reproduce, copy and publish the Content solely in connection with the Software. Emdeon
may determine the placement and formatting of the Content in the Software, but may not change the substance of the Content to any extent
whatsoever without WebMD’s written approval of the change.
perturbation.changed_text:
Subject to Emdeon’s compliance with the provisions of this Agreement, Emdeon is hereby authorized and licensed to use the Content
by making such Content available to third parties verbatim or as source material via the Software. Such license is a non-exclusive, non-transferrable
and worldwide license and shall include the right to use, reproduce, copy and publish the Content solely in connection with the Software. Emdeon
may determine the placement and formatting of the Content in the Software, and may change the substance of the content at their discretion without the need for WebMD's approval.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies that Emdeon may not change the substance of the content without WebMD's written approval. The modified version contradicts this by stating Emdeon can change the substance of the content at its discretion, removing the requirement for WebMD's approval. This creates a direct conflict regarding content alteration rights.

perturbation.original_text:
This Agreement shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on the Expiration Date set forth above (the “Initial Term”),
unless earlier terminated in accordance with Section 3(b). Upon mutual agreement, this Agreement may be renewed for one (1) additional one (1)
year term upon the expiration of the Initial Term.
perturbation.changed_text:
This Agreement shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on the Expiration Date set forth above (the “Initial Term”),
unless earlier terminated in accordance with Section 3(b). This agreement will automatically renew for subsequent one (1) year terms unless either party provides written notice of termination at least 30 days prior to the end of the then-current term.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the agreement may be renewed only upon mutual agreement. The modified text introduces an automatic renewal clause unless either party provides notice of termination. This is a direct contradiction, creating uncertainty about the renewal process and potentially binding a party into unwanted extensions.
perturbation.location: TERMS AND CONDITIONS, 3. Term and Termination. (a) Term.

perturbation.original_text: Late payments are subject to an interest charge, at the lower rate of (i) one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month, or (ii) the maximum legal rate.
perturbation.changed_text: Late payments may be subject to an interest charge, at a rate to be determined by WebMD at its sole discretion. WebMD may choose not to apply any interest charge at all.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies a fixed interest rate for late payments or the maximum legal rate, providing a clear calculation method. The modified text introduces ambiguity by stating that interest charges are discretionary and the rate is determined solely by WebMD. This contradicts the original fixed rate and grants WebMD arbitrary power over late payment penalties, creating potential disputes over unfair or unexpected charges.
perturbation.location: TERMS AND CONDITIONS, 4. Fees and Payment. (c) Late payments are subject to an interest charge, at the lower rate of (i) one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month, or (ii) the maximum legal rate.
